DOC.brief_title: The Protection Effect Speeda® Rabies Vaccine Human Use
DOC.detailed_description: When found injury bitten animal three-level , investigator would enroll participant explain protection making sign informed consent . The patient would inject rabies vaccine follow national regulation , meanwhile investigator would get blood sample detect whether man-killer carry rabies virus .
